title: New champion - Caine the Noxian Torturer
body:
Hey guys, I have a new champion idea I want to share. It took me a while to do this, but here it is :)
Feel free to post any improvements. I know it's rough but I made him up on the spot. Also, I was designing other champs so I didn't put my full attention to this one. Feedback would be great, thanks! :)
I've posted this same champion before, but I've made some improvement's and am reposting cause I want someone at Rito Game HQ to notice me ;)

League of Legends Character 1.
Name: Caine
Title: the Noxian Torturer
Weapon: Whip
Siblings: None
Faction: Noxus
Role: Marksman/Fighter
Lane: Bottom/Top
Gender: Male

Base Stats:
1: / 18:
Health = 548 / Health = 1942
Attack Damage = 48 / Attack Damage = 108
Health Regeneration = 5.9 / Health Regeneration = 17.8
Attack Speed = 0.663 / Attack Speed = 0.663
Mana = 398 / Mana = 1112
Armour = 26.3 / Armour = 82.4
Mana Regeneration = 8.2 / Mana Regeneration = 19.3
Magic Resist = 31.4 / Magic Resist = 31.4
Range = 550 / Range = 550
Movement Speed = 330 / Movement Speed = 330

Abilities:

Passive: Satisfaction
Gains a stack whenever he kills a unit or hits an enemy champion, stacking up to 6 stacks. If he doesn't kill a unit or hit an enemy champion within 5 seconds, a stack disappears, after the first stack disappears, 1 stack at a time disappear after 1 second. Once he reaches 6 stacks, his next 2 basic attacks will deal 25% of AD as bonus magic damage. Cannot gain stacks for 4 seconds after this ability has been used.

Q: Get back here!
Throws his whip out in a straight line of 850 units, striking through all enemies, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (Scales 35% AD) physical damage to the first target, and dealing 15% damage less to each target behind, max 45% reduced damage. All targets he hits, he pulls in 200 units.
Buffed ability pulls enemies in 100/150/200 units further and does not deal less damage per target hit. Additionally applies Poison Tip's DoT.
Cooldown: 12/11/10/9/8
Mana: 80/90/100/110/120
Skill shot

W: Enjoyment
Gains 20%/26%/32%/38%/44% attack speed for 5 seconds, and additionally, his next basic attack deals 40/70/100/130/160 (Scales 65% AD) bonus physical damage and reduces his targets total damage output by 15%/19%/23%/27%/31% (Gains 1% every 50 AP).
Buffed ability heals Caine 125/175/225 health and also restores one third of that amount as mana on first hit.
Cooldown: 16/15/14/13/12 after first hit
Mana: 60/75/90/105/120
Self buff

E: No escape
Flings a second whip from his left arm sleeve around 1 enemy within 600 units' legs, slowing them by 40% for 4 seconds and dealing 35/70/105/140/175 (Scales 15% AD) physical damage.
Buffed ability roots target for 1.25/1.75/2.25 seconds instead of slowing.
Cooldown: Always 10 seconds
Mana: 60/70/80/90/100
Target ability

R: Execution
Passive: Wrist flick
Caine flicks his wrist before the whip hits, making it lash down harder. This deals 20/30/40 (Scales 30% AD) physical damage to target over 3 seconds.

Active: Execution
Gains 20%/30%/40% (Gains 1% for every 100 AD) as damage on hit. Also he gains 18%/21%/24% movement speed on hit for 1.5 seconds. All abilities gain a buff while this ability is active. Lasts 8 seconds.
Cooldown: 110/90/70 after expiration
Mana: 110/100/90
Self buff

Lore: I'm too lazy to write a lore. Something about him being beaten by his parents in his childhood and now he wants everyone to feel the pain he felt? 

Description:
Very skinny. Brown long sleeved coat. Long brown pants. Long horizontal scar under right eye. Short blonde hair. White skin but slightly orange.
Whip: Black handle and very dark brown leather whip. When Execution is activated, the whip glows a dark green.

Skin:
Cowboy Caine: Light brown cowboy hat. Brown leather boots with roller blade on back of heel. Light(ish) Brown Poncho with small leather strings dangling off at end of sleeves and collar.
Whip: Light(ish) brown lasso.

replies.body:
i've always thought about creating a champion with a whip as weapon and this is just what i would love to play as, another ideas as for later skins could be a circus lion tamer or one like the Indiana Jones movies.

well done
Thank you! I've also done a light lance girl named Edea, she is the one I've worked on most, I'll probably post her soon, just need to do her stats and finishing touches.
Yes, once you write a full lore.

I'm too lazy :S

Write one for me and I'll give you the credit for it?? 

Thanks for the comment :D
give me a short 20 word discription of this character and if I can I will try and write a full one.

Sadist, torturer... Noxian, no siblings, whip.

Should have a sad past w/ his parents dying after being tortured or something... and he swears vengance

How does this sound so far.

Caine - The Noxian Torturer.

Since Caine was a young child he has had flash back nightmares of his parents dieing because they fought mentally hard trying not to give away any information about the Noxus invasion onto Demacia, during there torture. Caine now only noticing who the true torturers were he spends the rest of his days trying to hunting Garen and Jaravan IV because they tortured and killed his parents trying to get information about the Noxus invasion.

Now he seeks Garen and Jaravan IV because of this and he won't stop until they are tortured to death. As he gains ranks within the Noxus military he teams up with a rogue member known as Swain - The Master Technician and as they fight there way side by side to capture Garen and Jaravan IV until they are locked away and tortured by there rogue ways.
Sounds great! I'll edit it up a bit and post it! Thank you so much! I won't forget to give you the credit too ;)
